titleStmt.title: Paradise transplanted and restored in a most artfull and lively representation of the several creatures, plants, flowers, and other vegetables, in their full growth, shape, and colour: shown at Christopher Whiteheads at the two wreathed posts in Shooe-Lane, London. Written by I.H. Gent.
titleStmt.author: I. H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
